CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, July 28, 1951, pg. 32 reads: "Presenting Awards - Mrs. Marion Bond Jordon is pictured presenting the scholarship awards given to contestants by the Metoka Club at its eighth annual garden party last Thursday. The awards came to the grand total of $1,197.50. Left to right: Mrs. Jordon, Melvin Campbell, James H. Moone, June Tolliver, Hattie B. Harris, Elizabeth Thomas, who stood in proxy for her brother; Gloria Braxton and Delores Sandford. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of Metoka Club scholarship winners, from left: Delores Sandford, June Tolliver, Melvin Campbell, Elizabeth Thomas, who stood in proxy for her brother; James H. Moone, and Gloria Braxton, posed outdoors during eighth annual garden party
